value.excerpt: In this edition of Azure Tips and Tricks, learn how to use Azure App Configuration to manage and secure application settings and secrets in a central place. value.title: Operational best practices for web apps on Azure App Service | Azure Friday
value.excerpt: Azure App Service hosts millions of apps, serves trillions of requests per day, and has an SLA of 99.95%. But what should you do when your app has issues in production?
